T02D2838:180a-0: @180a * // thugs rje chen po tshe rabs dbang du gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2838:180a-1: dal ba 'dis lam dbang du ma gyur ba'i sgrub
T02D2838:180a-2: pa po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs dbang
T02D2838:180a-3: du gyur pa'i brtags pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2838:180a-4: ji ltar spyod pa'i gnas nyid du //
T02D2838:180a-5: 'jig rten pha rol dran byas nas //
T02D2838:180a-6: ji skad bshad pa'i man ngag gis //
T02D2838:180a-7: dbang gyur 'phags pa mnyes par bya //
T02D2838:180a-8: dal ba ring du mi gnas dang //
T02D2838:180a-10: som nyi spangs nas srid pa las //
T02D2838:180a-11: yid byung zhi la dga' ba bskyed //
T02D2838:180a-12: bdag gis yongs su gzung ba gang //
T02D2838:180a-13: ji tsam chags pas rjes bsrungs pa //
T02D2838:180a-14: de dag de tsam skyo ba yis //
T02D2838:180a-15: mchod sbyin byas te gcig pur gnas //
T02D2838:180a-16: zhing 'dir gdug pa drag po dang //
T02D2838:180a-17: mi g-yo la sogs 'dun pa che //
T02D2838:180a-18: ltos bral lhag par mos bcas pa //
T02D2838:180a-19: rnal 'byor rgyal po nges par bya//
T02D2838:180a-20: de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyi snying po gsum lha'i mtshan ma gsum du bsgyur te /
T02D2838:180a-21: tha mal lus las 'das nas ting nge 'dzin sems
T02D2838:180a-22: dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pas bcom ldan 'das tshe
T02D2838:180a-23: rabs dbang du gyur pa'i gzugs kyi 'du byas pa
T02D2838:180a-24: la zhugs te bla ma dang lha rjes dus dran
T02D2838:180a-25: pa dang ma bral ba bzhin du rig pa mchog
T02D2838:180a-27: aom a'a: hr'i: ma ma pa ra dz'armma ra ksh'a
T02D2838:180a-28: ba ra ne gubti birya bya ma he sv'a h'a
T02D2838:180a-29: / aom a'a:hr'i: sarba du sht'a na ma ma kri te dzam bha ya /
T02D2838:180a-35: aom a': hr'i: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02D2838:180a-36: ma ma par dz'armma ta ra sarba pre sthe be
T02D2838:180a-37: r'aksha bar nam gupti sma ra sma ra pra ti
T02D2838:180a-38: dzny'a ma h'a sa ma ya su sma ra sv'a
T02D2838:180a-39: h'a / brtson pa'i cha lugs gnas zhabs gnyis //
T02D2838:180a-40: gang du 'dod pa'i zhing der bskyod //
T02D2838:180a-41: chu skyes la sogs sdong bu'am //
T02D2838:180a-42: rin chen pho brang mchog bdag 'jug / rmi lam rmis pas bar chod pa //
T02D2838:180a-43: do mod mtshan mo'i bar skabs 'bras //
T02D2838:180a-44: mkhas pas dogs pa med byas te //
T02D2838:180a-45: lha bsnyen ji ltar 'dod bzhin skye //
T02D2838:180a-46: skye bo kun gyi mngal sgor ni //
T02D2838:180a-47: snying rje chen po spangs pa'i rten //
T02D2838:180a-48: sa bon sdig pa bsams nas ni //
T02D2838:180a-49: rtag tu 'jigs pas goms par bya //
T02D2838:180a-50: dpal ldan shar sogs yongs dag zhing //
T02D2838:180a-51: mngon dga' drag pos rtag goms pas//
T02D2838:180b-0: @180b smon lam lhan cig dang srong mthus //
T02D2838:180b-1: skar mda' lta bur thogs pa med //
